3rd attack for a faerie - 'Large faerie dust'.  Alternate for this 
attack: Launch multiple dusts in the same direction at the same time.


Giant Skeletons - in addition to 'split', 'Giant Bone' attack.  
basically the same attack as a regular skeleton, but appopriately 
sized for this creature.  'Throw' attack.  This attack involves 
picking up an opponent and throwing him on the ground.  4th attack, 
'Leap'.  This allow a giant skeleton to jump over obstacles (like 
trees, walls, etc).
